Classification.Name: Animal
Classification.Description: Affected by Animal Handling and Animal spells.

Classification.Name: Demon
Classification.Description: A hostile extra-dimensional creature subject to the banish spell.

Classification.Name: Dire Animal
Classification.Description: A mutant animal affected by Animal Handling and Animal spells.

Classification.Name: Elder Thing
Classification.Description: A hostile extra-dimensional creature not subject to the banish spell.

Classification.Name: Elemental
Classification.Description: A magical creature subject to Banish and Control Elemental.

Classification.Name: Giant Animal
Classification.Description: A giant animal affected by Animal Handling and Animal spells.

Classification.Name: Hybrid
Classification.Description: An Animal, but shares traits of two or more beasts and requires a special subset of Animal spells.

Classification.Name: Mundane
Classification.Description: A living thing that isn't Animal, Plant or Slime that has vital areas.

Classification.Name: Servitor
Classification.Description: A extra-dimensional creature subject to the banish spell.

Classification.Name: Slime
Classification.Description: A diffuse, IQ 0 ooze that's immune to most Animal and Plant spells.

Classification.Name: Undead
Classification.Description: Can be turned with True Faith.
